info.title: Accounts Service
info.description: Service for managing Physical and Virtual Accounts.

get.summary: Gets physical account by account filter

parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the account

parameters.name: AccountNumber
parameters.description: The account number

parameters.name: BankCode
parameters.description: The Bank Identification Code (BIC) of the institution providing the account

parameters.name: BranchCode
parameters.description: The branch code of the institution providing the account

parameters.name: SWIFTCode
parameters.description: The SWIFT code of the institution providing the account

parameters.name: BIC
parameters.description: The Bank Identification Code (BIC)/SWIFT code of the institution providing the account

parameters.name: Group
parameters.description: Any free-form grouping of accounts

parameters.name: ProductIds
parameters.description: The primary ID of the product associated to the account

parameters.name: ProviderId
parameters.description: The ID of the provider associated to the account

parameters.name: ExternalId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account at the external counter-party who provides it

parameters.name: ProviderType
parameters.description: The type of provider associated to the account

parameters.name: ExternalReference
parameters.description: A human-readable account reference provided by an external counter-party

parameters.name: AccountStatus
parameters.description: The status of the account

parameters.name: InvestorId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Investor that owns this account, if this is an Investor Account

parameters.name: AccountType
parameters.description: The type or purpose of the account.

parameters.name: CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrAfter
parameters.description:
Select only those Accounts Created on or after a particular point in time
Use in conjunction with CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrBefore to filter a range of dates

parameters.name: CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrBefore
parameters.description:
Select only those Accounts Created on or before a particular point in time
Use in conjunction with CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrAfter to filter a range of dates

parameters.name: NameContains
parameters.description: Filter for accounts whose name contains this value

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The desired page of results (first page = 1)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The desired number of results per page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A guid uniquely identifying the physical account

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: A set of account details to be used for the update. Only include the parameters you wish to change and delete the others

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A guid uniquely identifying the physical account

parameters.name: accountRequest
parameters.description: A set of required account data used for creation.

get.summary: Gets virtual accounts by account filter.

parameters.name: PhysicalId
parameters.description: The primary ID of the parent physical account

parameters.name: PhysicalIds
parameters.description: The primary IDs of the parent physical account

parameters.name: InvestorId
parameters.description: The primary ID of an owner of a virtual account. Mutually exclusive with InvestorIds.

parameters.name: InvestorIds
parameters.description: The primary IDs of any owners of a virtual account

parameters.name: VirtualAccountIds
parameters.description: List of IDs of virtual accounts being requested

parameters.name: ProductId
parameters.description: The primary ID of the product associated to a virtual account's physical account

parameters.name: ProductIds
parameters.description: The primary ID of the product associated to a virtual account's physical account

parameters.name: ProviderId
parameters.description: The ID of the provider associated to a virtual account's physical account

parameters.name: AccountType
parameters.description: The Account Type

parameters.name: ProviderType
parameters.description: The provider type

parameters.name: AccountStatus
parameters.description: The status of the account, for backward compatibility if not specified, the system assumes Active Accounts only.

parameters.name: ExternalReference
parameters.description: Reference to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

parameters.name: ExternalAccountNumber
parameters.description: Account Number to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

parameters.name: NameContains
parameters.description: Filter for accounts whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: NameIsExactly
parameters.description: Filter for accounts whose name matches the suppliced value exactly.

parameters.name: CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrAfter
parameters.description:
Select only those Accounts Created on or after a particular point in time
Use in conjunction with CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrBefore to filter a range of dates

parameters.name: CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrBefore
parameters.description:
Select only those Accounts Created on or before a particular point in time
Use in conjunction with CreatedUTCDateTimeOnOrAfter to filter a range of dates

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The desired page of results (first page = 1)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The desired number of results per page

get.summary: Gets a virtual account by its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the virtual account.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: A set of account details to be used for the update. Only include the parameters you wish to change and delete the others

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the virtual account.

AccountingPurpose.description:
Possible values:
Undefined
Assets
ContraAssets
Capital
Drawings
Expenses
Income
Liabilities
ContraLiabilities

AccountStatus.description:
The status of an account

Possible values:
Undefined (The account is in an unknown state)
Pending (The account is awaiting activation)
Active (The account is active)
Declined (The account could not be activated)
Activating (The account is currently in the process of being activated at a 3rd party)

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the account at the external counter-party who provides it

externalReference.description: A human-readable account reference provided by an external counter-party

bic.description: The Bank Identification Code (BIC)/SWIFT code of the institution providing the account

branchCode.description: The branch code of the institution providing the account.

swiftCode.description: The SWIFT code of the institution providing the account

statusInformation.description: Any extra information for the current status of the account

identifier.description: The primary ID of the physical account

productId.description: The primary ID of the product the account is used for

providerId.description: The ID of the Methodic provider which interacts with the account

providerType.description: The type of the Methodic provider which interacts with the account

investorId.description: The identifier of the Investor that owns this account, if this is an Investor Account

accountType.description: The type or purpose of the account.

tenantId.description: The primary ID of the tenant the account is used for

defaultCurrency.description: The default currency for the account, used to specify cash transactions when the provider does not indicate the currency explictly

branchCode.description: The branch code of the institution providing the account.

statusInformation.description: Any extra information for the current status of the account

accountType.description: The type or purpose of the account.

tenantId.description: The primary ID of the Tenant the account is used for

PhysicalAccountModificationRequest.description: Information required to create a new physical account

externalReference.description: A human-readable account reference provided by an external counter-party

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the account at the external counter-party who provides it

The Bank Identification Code (BIC) of the institution providing the account

Possible values:
Undefined
Omnibus
Clearing
Investor

VirtualAccount.description: An account used to track cash flows for a specific purposes within a physical account.

identifier.description: The primary ID of the virtual account.

investorId.description: The primary ID of the investor who owns the account, if applicable.

physicalAccountId.description: The primary ID of the parent physical account.

accountType.description: The type or purpose of the account.

physicalAccount.description: The parent physical account associated with this virtual account.

accountingPurpose.description: Determines how the account is treated from an accounting perspective. E.g. Balance sheet vs Income statement and how a balance increase is effected.

virtualAccountStatus.description: Dermines if the account is Active, Suspended etc.

externalReference.description: Reference to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

externalAccountNumber.description: Account Number to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

VirtualAccountCreationRequest.description: Data required to create a new virtual account

investorId.description: The primary ID of the investor who owns the account

physicalAccountId.description: The primary ID of the parent physical account

externalReference.description: Reference to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

externalAccountNumber.description: Account Number to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

VirtualAccountModificationRequest.description: Data used to update an existing account, supply values for those attributes you wish to update.

externalReference.description: Reference to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.

externalAccountNumber.description: Account Number to be used by Investors when making deposits etc.
